title: Grand Tour Racing Is Awesome without Tadej Pogačar. But No, It’s Not ‘Better.’
content:
Opinion: The Vuelta a España was a wide-open thrill-ride in the absence of Pogačar and Vingegaard. But grand tour racing will be all the better when they're back.

Read the full article at Grand Tour Racing Is Awesome without Tadej Pogačar. But No, It’s Not ‘Better.’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
